title: Got 2 Of the same garen skins from mystery gift...
body: Hi i recently purchased RP (15th December ) (520) To buy a mystery gift , surprisingly i received Desert Trooper Garen at a value of 520 RP . You guys (Riot) Today have sent me a mystery gift and i received the exact same skin.....I don't that is fair because i practically wasted a whole mystery gift . Is there any way this can be resolved ? Thank you , Merry Christmas to all of you!

replies.body:
Get in touch with Riot’s [Billing & Store Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)

* The primary category is already chosen. 

* Under the secondary select **Billing & Store.**

* For the tertiary category select **Content Refund.**

Explain your issue clearly. 

http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Debonair-Ezreal.jpg
